description: Indices of the left-to-right maxima in A057635.
comments: A number m belongs to this sequence iff A057635(k) < A057635(m) for all k<m.Indices of records in A057635(n), the maximal m with phi(m)=n.The Alekseyev link in A131883 establishes the following explicit relationship between A131883, A036912 and A057635. Namely, for t belonging to A036912, we have t=A131883(A057635(t)-1). In other words, A036912(n) = A131883(A057635(A036912(n))-1) for all n.
links: T. D. Noe, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..5000
author: _David W. Wilson_
extensions: More precise definition from Max Alekseyev, Nov 07 2007
